body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Bryan Rivera and the customer's name is Cynthia Moore.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Bryan Rivera, and I'm with Phat Hogs, your go-to motorcycle dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Cynthia! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed about choosing the right bike.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. Selecting the perfect motorcycle can be a bit daunting. Can I get your current age to provide better options?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you please provide me with your zip code as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My zip code is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that, Cynthia! That helps narrow down some options for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It’s my pleasure! Thank you for your time, Cynthia. Have a great day!
